"A.P.241/11/7 11:00":
"Yo, <%me>.
Look who had to show up."
"Enga, it's been a while."
"What's with the sudden appearance?"
"Yeah, it sure has. Although, we've been relying on ARKS almost constantly this whole time."
"Xiera called me in. Since I'm more or less the representative of Earth here."
"Since the Earth side isn't unrelated to what's been happening with the Akashic Record, I briefed him on the situation."
"From what I heard, it sounds like the trouble on Earth is partially to blame."
"Creating an entire world is on a different scale but... Well, it's more or less the same as what Deus Esca did."
"Ah, things on Earth are the same as ever though. Hitsugi and Aru are doing well."
"Now and then some Phantoms appear, but Earth Guide and Mother Cluster have been teaming up to deal with them."
"And if anything bigger shows up, we have ARKS to lend a hand. There haven't really been any problems."
"So thanks to all of you, life on Earth has been pretty peaceful."
"Come to think of it, Aratron and the number freak are on a business trip to America right now."
"Apparently, something strange has been noticed in space and they're helping with the analysis."

"Speak of the devil. It's Miss Numbers herself.
Do I have to take it? ...Probably."

"Hey, 10% sexy guy!
You're supposed to pick up within 2 rings!"
"Ahh, give me a break! Just tell us why you called already!"
"Huh? Are you over in Oracle? What are you doing there?"
"They asked me to come, obviously. Things have gotten pretty serious on the Oracle side."
"Well, this is serious too! That's why I'm calling! If things are getting serious on the Oracle side, then they're super serious here! 200% serious!"
"Huh? What do you mean?"

"Hoho, this is hopeless.
I'll explain instead."
"Gramps? ...Then it must be serious after all."
"What the heck's that supposed to mean, 10% sexy guy!"
"Settle down, Och. The ARKS members will want to hear this too."
"A black hole has suddenly formed, not too far outside of the solar system."

"The distance being what it is, there's
no immediate cause for concern, but..."

"...It just appeared, without any sign of
a supernova or other possible cause."

"More urgently, the readings show it's growing at an alarming rate.
Nothing about it is normal."
"So if this black hole or whatever keeps growing at this pace... What'll happen?"
"What do you think will happen? It'll swallow not just Earth, but the entire solar system. Goodbye everything."
"Och and I will be working together with government agencies around the world to hasten the investigation."
"Enga Yasaka, please work together with ARKS and let us know if and when you discover anything."
"A black hole suddenly appearing and growing impossibly fast... It's just like the one over here."
"The Akashic Record is the chronicle of all existence. So even if you cross dimensions, the same phenomenon will occur."
"Then it sounds like your problem is definitely ours as well."
"Seems like I should tell Hitsugi and Aru about this too."
"If something happens, let me know. I'll get the Earth side moving right away."
"Understood. Thank you for your cooperation."
